messages.title: Why vote for Jack?
messages.content: I am your local candidate. I have lived almost all of my life in Burntisland and Dalgety Bay. I can represent the views of people in Fife. Not the Gaelic fantasy world of Holyrood. Not traditional Westminster. And not remote, bureaucratic Brussels. I live in the real world, our world. One thatâ€™s fascinated with political structures or devolved powers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An immediate referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union.
No Tax on the minimum wage for a 40 hour working week.
We will take back control of our borders with an Australian-style points-based immigration system.
Increase the defence budget to meet our obligations to NATO and spend 2% of GDP on defence and support our trident nuclear deterrent.
Abolish green taxes and subsidies thus lowering energy bills.

issues.brexitEurope: An immediate referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union.
issues.environment: Abolish green taxes and subsidies thus lowering energy bills.
issues.immigration: We will take back control of our borders with an Australian-style points-based immigration system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am interested in the basic, crucial issues in our lives: jobs, good schools, and an NHS which is fit for purpose. I want low taxation. I want less government interference in our private lives. And I want controls over immigration. Not talk about controls. But reasonable controls. Vote for what you believe. Vote for Britain. Vote for 'Union Jack'.
